verses.arabic: لَوْ أَنزَلْنَا هَٰذَا الْقُرْآنَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٍ لَّرَأَيْتَهُ خَاشِعًا مُّتَصَدِّعًا مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ
verses.english: Had We sent down this Qur'an upon a mountain, you would have seen it humbled and coming apart from fear of Allah.
verses.urdu: Agar humne yeh Quran kisi pahad par bhi utaar diya hota to tum dekhte ke woh Allah ke khauf se daba jaa raha hai, aur phata padta hai.

verses.arabic: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ ۖ هُوَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.english: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.
verses.urdu: Allah! Uska siva koi ibadat ke laayak nahin, woh zinda hai, sab kuch chalaane waala hai.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: This is the Book in which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.
verses.urdu: Yeh Allah ki kitaab hai, is mein koi shak nahin, hidayat hai un parheizgaar logon ke liye.

verses.english: Indeed, We have granted you, O Prophet, abundant goodness.
verses.urdu: (Ay Nabi) Beshak, Humne tumhein kausar ata kiya.

verses.english: He said, "Who is the Lord of you all, O Moses?"
verses.urdu: Firaun ne kaha "aacha, to phir tum dono ka Rabb kaun hai ay Musa?"
